attributes.action: Make it law for MPs and PMs to disclose their shares and asset holdings
attributes.additional_details: We want those in government to act in the countries best interest rather than their own. The entirety of everyone's wealth of those in government must be disclosed so the public can be confident they have no conflict of interests.
attributes.background: Create a new law for Members of Parliament and Prime Ministers to disclose and regularly publish their share and asset holdings.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. MPs, including Ministers, are already required to declare financial interests. You can find out more here:

https://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/standards-and-financial-interests/parliamentary-commissioner-for-standards/registers-of-interests/register-of-members-financial-interests/
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
